level.heading: Officers and employees; personnel system; compensation; benefits. [Repealed]
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 108 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1223.01.

level.heading: Resolutions
level.text: Resolution 16-212, the "Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Operating Documents Approval Resolution of 2005", was approved effective June 21, 2005.
